com.satori.rtm

Class RtmClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.satori.rtm.RtmClientBuilder

  • public class RtmClientBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Use the RtmClientBuilder to create an instance of the RtmClient interface and set both the client properties and the listener for client state events.

    Code Example 

     
 RtmClient client = new RtmClientBuilder(ENDPOINT, APP_KEY)
            .setListener(new RtmClientAdapter() {
                // overridden methods go here
            )}
            .build();
            ...

    After you create the client, use the client instance to publish messages and subscribe to channels.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RtmClientBuilder

        public RtmClientBuilder(java.lang.String endpoint,
                        java.lang.String appKey)
        Creates a instance of a client builder for specific endpoint and application key.

        Use the Developer Portal to obtain the appropriate application keys.

        Parameters:
        endpoint - RTM Service endpoint.
        appKey - Application key.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public RtmClient build()
        Builds an instance of the RtmClient interface. Use this method after you set the client properties and listener.
        Returns:
        RtmClient

      • setConnectionTimeout

        public RtmClientBuilder setConnectionTimeout(int connectionTimeout)
        Sets the connection timeout interval. The timeout interval is the time, in milliseconds, in which the client attempts to make a WebSocket connection to the RTM Service. If the timeout is exceeded before a connection is made, the client throws TransportListener.onConnectingError(Exception).

        Setting this property is optional. Default is 60000.

        Parameters:
        connectionTimeout - Timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        RtmClientBuilder instance.

      • setPendingActionQueueLength

        public RtmClientBuilder setPendingActionQueueLength(int pendingActionQueueLength)
        Sets the length of pending action queue. When a client is disconnected, the pending action queue temporarily stores messages until the client reconnects.
        Parameters:
        pendingActionQueueLength - Length of the queue. Default value is 1024.
        Returns:
        RtmClientBuilder instance.

      • setMaxReconnectInterval

        public RtmClientBuilder setMaxReconnectInterval(long maxReconnectInterval)
        Sets the maximum time period, in seconds, to wait between reconnection attempts. The Java SDK uses the following formula:

        min(minReconnectInterval * (2 ^ (attempt_number), maxReconnectInterval)

        to calculate the reconnect interval after the client disconnects from the RTM Service for any reason. The timeout period between each successive connection attempt increases, but never exceeds this value.

        Parameters:
        maxReconnectInterval - Maximum reconnect time in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        RtmClientBuilder instance.

      • setMinReconnectInterval

        public RtmClientBuilder setMinReconnectInterval(long minReconnectInterval)
        Sets the minimum time period, in seconds, to wait between reconnection attempts. The Java SDK uses the following formula:

        min(minReconnectInterval * (2 ^ (attempt_number), maxReconnectInterval)

        to calculate the reconnect interval after the client disconnects from the RTM Service for any reason. The timeout period between each successive connection attempt increases, but starts with this value.

        Parameters:
        minReconnectInterval - Minimum reconnect time in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        RtmClientBuilder instance.

      • setListener

        public RtmClientBuilder setListener(RtmClientListener listener)
        Sets an instance of a RtmClientListener to define application functionality based on the state changes of a client. To create a listener, create an instance of the RtmClientListener interface and override the RtmClientListener methods to define application functionality based on client state changes.
        Parameters:
        listener - Instance of RtmClientListener.
        Returns:
        RtmClientBuilder instance.

      • setTransportFactory

        public RtmClientBuilder setTransportFactory(TransportFactory transportFactory)
        Sets factory for a WebSocket transport.

        Java does not include a native WebSocket implementation. This method allows you to use a different WebSocket implementation other than the default Java SDK WebSocket transport.

        By default, the Java SDK uses the nv-websocket-client WebSocket client implementation.

        Parameters:
        transportFactory - WebSocket transport factory.
        Returns:
        RtmClientBuilder instance.
        See Also:
        WebSocketTransport, WebSocketTransportFactory

      • setAuthProvider

        public RtmClientBuilder setAuthProvider(AuthProvider authProvider)
        Sets an implementation of AuthProvider as the authentication provider for the client.

        Use this method if you want to authenticate an application user when you establish the connection.

        Parameters:
        authProvider - Authentication provider.
        Returns:
        RtmClientBuilder instance.

      • setAutoReconnect

        public RtmClientBuilder setAutoReconnect(boolean isAutoReconnect)
        Sets the automatic reconnect option for the client connection to the RTM Service. Use true to enable automatic reconnect and false to disable it.

        If you enable automatic reconnect, the client attempts to reconnect to the RTM Service whenever the connection to the RTM Service fails.

        Parameters:
        isAutoReconnect - true enables automatic reconnect; false disables it.
        Returns:
        RtmClientBuilder instance.

      • setScheduler

        public RtmClientBuilder setScheduler(java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService service)
        Sets the scheduler to run delayed or periodic tasks. If not specified, it will be created automatically.
        Parameters:
        service - Instance of ScheduledExecutorService.
        Returns:
        RtmClientBuilder instance.

      • setDispatcher

        public RtmClientBuilder setDispatcher(java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService dispatcher,
                                      boolean shouldDispatchTransport)
        Sets the external dispatcher. All transport events and user actions are executed in dispatcher. External dispatcher must provide the order of events.
        Parameters:
        dispatcher - Dispatcher
        shouldDispatchTransport - If false then dispatcher will not be used for transport events (for example if they already dispatched).
        Returns:
        RtmClientBuilder instance.

      • setJsonSerializer

        public RtmClientBuilder setJsonSerializer(Serializer serializer)
        Sets an implementation of Serializer for the JSON serialization/deserialization of PDUs.

        By default, SDK uses google-gson library, but you could use any library for that task.

        Parameters:
        serializer - Instance of Serializer
        Returns:
        RtmClientBuilder instance.
